messages.content:
👋 Hi! I'm InsightX, your UPI payment analytics assistant. Here are some things you can ask me:

• **Failure rates** — *'Compare failure rates across all transaction types'*
• **Fraud analysis** — *'Which state has the most flagged transactions?'*
• **Trends** — *'Show monthly transaction volume for 2024'*
• **Segmentation** — *'Which age group spends the most on weekends?'*
• **Risk** — *'What % of high-value transactions are flagged?'*

What would you like to explore?
